content: Chunhui (Kevin) Yao obtained his Bachlor’s degree of Engineering (awarded as an outstanding graduate) at Shanghai Jiao Tong University in 2020. Currently, he is a first-year PhD student at Centre for Photonic Systems in University of Cambridge, supervised by Dr. Qixiang Cheng. His research interests mainly focus on photonic integrated devices and circuits for optical communication and optical computing applications.
